Digital Marketing Manager Job at ElsaDave Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        ElsaDave Consulting Limited - Our client is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Manager

Job Location: Mainland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client is seekingan innovative and results-driven Digital Marketing Manager with strong social media management, content creation, and graphic design skills.
	The ideal candidate will manage the digital presence, develop marketing strategies, and execute campaigns to drive brand awareness, customer engagement, and lead generation across all online platforms.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop and implement a data-driven digital marketing strategy aligned with company goals.
	Manage and grow the company’s presence across social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter, etc.).
	Create and design engaging multimedia content, including graphics, reels, promotional materials, and advertisements.
	Plan and execute paid online campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads) for travel packages, trainings, and hospitality services.
	Collaborate with business development and sales teams to generate quality leads.
	Analyze digital campaign performance, prepare monthly reports, and recommend improvements.
	Stay updated on digital marketing trends, tools, and emerging platforms.
	Oversee the brand’s digital identity, ensuring consistency in tone, visuals, and messaging.
	Develop email marketing campaigns and manage subscriber lists.
	Support partnership and sponsorship pitches with presentations and creative content.


Requirements
Education:


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, Graphic Design, IT, or related field.


Experience:


	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in digital marketing and social media management, preferably in the travel or hospitality sector.
	Demonstrated success in creating and managing campaigns that drive measurable business growth.


Skills:


	Strong graphic design and video editing skills (Canva, Adobe Suite, etc.)
	Solid understanding of SEO, SEM, paid ads, and analytics tools.
	Excellent content writing and storytelling ability.
	Strong presentation and IT skills.
	Ability to work independently and in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
	Proficiency in data-driven marketing and conversion optimization.


Benefits


	Salary: N200,000- N250,000 (Gross) depending on Experience.
	Performance-based commission for lead generation and campaign success.
	Travel allowance where necessary.
	Hybrid work system after probation review & management approval.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should their CV to: elsadaveconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at ViveluxeAesthetics
content:
ViveluxeAesthetics, an aesthetics clinic, is recruiting to fill the positions below:

1.) Aesthetician

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a skilled and personable Aesthetician to join our team and provide high-quality skincare and beauty treatments to our clients.
	The ideal candidate will have a passion for skincare, strong interpersonal skills, and a commitment to delivering exceptional service.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Provide professional skincare services including facials, peels, microdermabrasion, and other advanced aesthetic treatments.
	Analyze clients' skin conditions and recommend appropriate skincare regimens and treatments.
	Perform hair removal services such as waxing, threading, and laser treatments (if certified).
	Maintain cleanliness and hygiene of the treatment area and tools in accordance with health and safety regulations.
	Keep accurate records of treatments and client progress.
	Educate clients on skincare products and routines.
	Stay updated with industry trends, new techniques, and product innovations.
	Upsell services and retail skincare products where appropriate.
	Assist in maintaining spa inventory and ordering supplies as needed.


Education & Certification


	High school diploma or equivalent.
	Completion of a state-approved esthetician or cosmetology program.
	Valid state licensure as an Aesthetician (as per local laws).
	Additional certifications in advanced skincare treatments (e.g., microdermabrasion, chemical peels, laser therapy) are an advantage.


Experience:


	Minimum of 1-2 years of experience in a spa, clinic, or salon setting preferred.
	Fresh graduates may be considered if well-trained and licensed.


Other Requirements:


	Strong work ethic and professional attitude.
	Team player and willingness to assist in various spa-related tasks.
	Commitment to ongoing training and development.
	Must Reside around Osapa London
	Only those on the island should apply.


Required Skills:


	Excellent knowledge of skincare treatments, techniques, and products.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Good manual dexterity and attention to detail.
	Customer-focused with a pleasant and professional demeanor.
	Sales and product knowledge to recommend appropriate skincare regimens.
	Time management and ability to manage appointments efficiently.


Application Closing Date: 8th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Viveluxeaesthetics@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Registered Nurse

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a qualified and compassionate Registered Nurse to join our spa team immediately.
	The ideal candidate will support our wellness and aesthetic services by providing expert care, administering non-invasive procedures, and ensuring the highest standards of client safety and satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities


	Administer spa-related medical and cosmetic treatments (e.g., IV therapy, skin care treatments, injectables – if licensed).
	Conduct client consultations to assess health status and suitability for treatments.
	Monitor clients during and after treatments to ensure safety and comfort.
	Maintain accurate medical records and treatment notes.
	Comply with health and safety regulations and maintain a sterile environment.
	Assist with training and supporting spa staff on medical protocols and wellness standards.
	Educate clients on treatment plans, skincare routines, and post-treatment care.
	Collaborate with other spa professionals to deliver integrated wellness solutions.


Required Skills & Competencies:


	Strong knowledge of health and hygiene protocols.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Attention to detail and commitment to client safety.
	Ability to stay calm and professional under pressure.
	Good documentation and organizational skills.
	Basic knowledge of aesthetic and wellness procedures (training willbe provided if needed).


Requirement
Education & Licensing:


	Must be a Registered Nurse (RN)with a valid practicing license.
	Certification in aesthetic nursing or cosmetic procedures (an advantage, but not mandatory).


Experience:


	Minimum of 1–2 years of nursing experience, ORwellness, dermatology, or spa/clinic settings.
	Experience with IV therapy, cosmetic treatments, or client care in a luxury or wellness-focused environment is a plus.


Other Requirement


	Must be professional, well-groomed, and customer-oriented.
	Willingness to work weekends and flexible shifts.
	Commitment to confidentiality and ethical standards.
	Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and client-focused environment.
	Must reside around Osapa London, Lekki
	Only those living on the Island should apply.


Remuneration


	Salary: N90,000 - N120,000 Monthly
	Performance-based bonuses or incentives.
	Staff discounts on spa services.
	Training and development opportunities.


Application Closing Date: 9th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV  to: Viveluxeaesthetics@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Spa Therapist

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a skilled and dedicated Spa Therapist to join our wellness team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for delivering a wide range of professional spa treatments, helping clients relax, rejuvenate, and achieve overall well-being. You must have a passion for wellness and a strong understanding of massage techniques and spa therapies.


Key Responsibilities


	Perform various body and facial treatments including massages, body scrubs, wraps, aromatherapy, and relaxation therapies.
	Conduct pre-treatment consultations and customize services based on client needs and preferences.
	Maintain a clean, organized, and tranquil treatment area in accordance with hygiene standards.
	Ensure a high level of client satisfaction through professional service and a welcoming demeanor.
	Recommend appropriate home-care products and wellness routines.
	Record treatment details, preferences, and any contraindications.
	Stay updated with spa trends, techniques, and product knowledge.
	Support team members and contribute to the smooth operation of the spa.


Required Skills & Competencies


	Proficiency in various massage techniques (e.g., Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, aromatherapy).
	Knowledge of body and skin care treatments.
	Excellent communication and customer service skills.
	Calm, friendly, and professional demeanor.
	Ability to assess client needs and recommend suitable treatments.
	Good physical stamina and hand strength for massage work.


Experience:


	1–2 years working experience in a spa, resort, or wellness center.
	Experience handling clients with diverse wellness needs is preferred.


Other Requirements:


	Must be presentable, courteous, and customer-oriented.
	Willing to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays.
	Strong attention to hygiene, safety, and confidentiality.
	Passionate about wellness, beauty, and client care.
	Must reside arround Osapa London, Lekki.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 per month. 

Remuneration:


	Tips and performance-based bonuses (if applicable).
	Employee discounts on spa services and products.
	Opportunities for professional development and training.


Application Closing Date: 26th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Viveluxeaesthetics@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
